You're welcome.  And I was planning on having them turn up at random 
(there could be more showing up than just two!)  Meteara would be able 
to detect them, so feel free to pick a location for one.  I'll set the 
other to pop up under someone's nose, so to speak.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Thanks, now can you tell me where were the two others?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: Brainstorm!  This could also attract the attention of the Vok 
> > themselves!
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > OOC: One would think a council member would actually pay more 
> > > attention to the RPG than this.  As has been stated several 
times 
> > > already, there are TWO groups of artifacts.  The cubes found 
> aboard 
> > > the Pred ship - and subsequently scattered to several places, 
> > > including Tripred HQ - were parts of a drive core belonging to a 
> > race 
> > > at war with the Vok.
> > > 
> > > The Soul Orbs were here since Primus-knows-when, and belong to 
the 
> > Vok 
> > > themselves.  (Attention, Meteara!)  Empath's discovery of one 
has 
> > > activated the other two on-planet, and potentially attracted 
more 
> > from 
> > > the depths of space.  Each Orb contains the souls of up to a 
> > thousand 
> > > Vok, hence the name.
> > > 
> > > If it's still not clicking, maybe we need a new mod.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > OOC: Huh... Weren't the things that fell down the sky the 
actual 
> > > > artifacts? Can anyone tell me? =|
